name: Slimes can't do magic
description:
In a world where Slimes do magic, you make your own anyway! Combine certain ingredients to enchant tools with powerful spells. Sell as many tools as you can before the day runs out!

Made for the July 2020 Kindred Community Jam #3

Coding: Kyyrozu
Music and UI art: Partymongrel
Sprites: Marcello
Game Design: GummiGamer, Partymongrel
